```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(DESeq2)
library(plotly)
library(EnhancedVolcano)
```


```{r}
data_path <- '../data/phenotype_comparison.deseq2.results.tsv'
```

```{r}
data <- read_table(data_path)
```

```{r}
p <- EnhancedVolcano(data,
    lab = rownames(data),
    x = 'log2FoldChange',
    y = 'padj',
    pCutoff = 0.05,
    FCcutoff = 1,
    pointSize = 2.0,
    labSize = 3.0)

ggplotly(p)
```
